attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bio-Ethanol (E85) is now readily available from several outlets at only 2p per litre less than unleaded. It reduces CO2 by 70% but is 25% less economical to run. If Government is serious about reducing CO2 emissions, then the cost per litre should be 33% less than Petrol to get people to switch.
